item.title: Creativity on the Margins of Academia
item.description: The other week, we had the pleasure of sitting down for a long Zoom chat about creativity with scholar, travel-writer and researcher Dr Tim Hannigan. Tim works for Dubline City University on their DCU CREDNE â€” Forging Creativity project.
